}}'''Makena''' is one of the nine [[Skin#Default skins|default]] skins [[player]]s can use in ''[[Minecraft]]'', and the last to be introduced. Commonly seen alongside [[Kai]], Makena is often used as a mascot for content such as [[Spring to Life]] and [[Fantastic Fairgrounds]].

== Appearance ==
Makena is typically depicted with slim arms, dark skin, and curly, dark brown hair hanging down their right shoulder. Their eyes are slightly dim white, with brown pupils, and below are visible cheekbones and brown lips. Their signature feature is a warm, yellow sweater, on top of light red shorts and black shoes.

In the [[Character Creator]], Makena has approximately five unique items.

== Trivia ==
* In a [[Mojang shorts|short]] Makena is referred to entirely as "Best Friend," even writing it down on signs.<ref>{{YouTube link|y_LE4Mj05rA|FRIEND LOGS OUT - WHAT DO YOU DO?|Minecraft|December 20, 2023}}</ref>
* On a video on the history of skins, Makena is used to represent the current generation on the thumbnail.<ref>{{YouTube link|qIrmhRHuW08|The History of Minecraft Skins|Minecraft|November 30, 2022}}</ref>
